nodes.bodyText: clear$ already does the check(bitIndex). Would it be better to have it only there, or is it better to be safe and perform that verification on both methods?
Ditto above about check in clear$

nodes.bodyText: Can't find that one but what I have done is make the files exactly the same except s/int/long/. They now line up in diff and (easier to see!) line length.
